name: Reuben
description: Corned beef, sauerkraut, swiss cheese, and thousand island dressing served on rye bread.

name: Cup of Soup
description: Cup of today's soup. Ask your server for details.

name: Soup
description: Bowl of today's soup. Ask your server for details.

name: Wedge Salad
description: Wedge of iceberge lettuce topped with blue cheese dressing, bacon cumbles, diced tomato, and chives.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Romain lettuce and croutons dressed with lemon juice, olive oil, egg, Worcestershire sauce, anchovies, garlic, Dijon mustard, Parmesan cheese, and black pepper.

name: Soup and salad
description: Cup of soup of your choice with a side salad of your choice.
